Entries.Wed: Looks like a good day to play catch, huh?$u#$e#$q 5/6 Wed_01_old#I'd ask you to throw the ball around, but you don't really seem like the sports type.^I'd ask you to throw the ball around, but you don't really seem like the sports type.#$r 6 0 Wed_01_02#I'm fine just watching you from a distance.#$r 5 15 Wed_01_01#I want to play catch with you!#$r 5 0 Wed_01_03#(angry) What's that supposed to mean?
Entries.Sat: My arms are really sore, but that's the sign of progress for a girl like me.#e#I must've done a thousand push-ups yesterday.

Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I think I might start reading books. I don't want to become stagnant now that I'm a married gal!
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: How's it going? I've been carrying the old gridball around with me all day. A girl can pretend...$u
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Oh... the smell? I've been eating garlic all day. I'm trying to stay toned... Sorry.$l
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to my new life as a stay-at-home mom.$h
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to grow up strong, just like Mommy.
Entries.OneKid_3: I had always sort of wondered what it was like to be pregnant.$h^I wonder what it's like to be pregnant...?$h
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? I better do some extra push-ups tonight.$9#$e#Those dresses are pretty tight... and everyone's going to be watching closely.
